constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the DuelFactory contract.

params._duelFee: The fee percentage in basis points (e.g., 125 for 1.25%).
params._duelWallet: Address of the wallet for collecting duel fees.

createDuel(string,address,address,uint25.details: This function deploys a new proxy and two `DuelOption` contracts for the duel.

params._decisionLockDuration: Duration in seconds for the decision lock period.
params._fundingDuration: Duration in seconds for the funding period.
params._judge: Address of the judge who can decide the duel outcome. If address(0), the duel will be decided by the players.
params._payoutA: Address for payout wallet of player A.
params._targetAmount: The target amount of funding for both Option contracts in wei.

returns._0: The address of the newly created duel (proxy) contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only the contract owner can call this function.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDuelWallet(address).details: Only the contract owner can call this function.

params._newWallet: The address of the new duel wallet.

setFee(uint256).details: Only the contract owner can call this function.

params._newFee: The new fee percentage in basis points (e.g., 125 for 1.25%).

setImplementation(address).details: Only the contract owner can call this function.

params._newImplementation: The address of the new `Duel` implementation contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only the contract owner can call this function.

createDuel(string,address,address,uint25.notice: Creates a new duel by deploying a UUPS proxy for the `Duel` contract.

pause().notice: Pauses duel creation and updates by the factory.

setDuelWallet(address).notice: Sets a new wallet address for collecting duel fees.

setFee(uint256).notice: Updates the fee percentage for new duels.

setImplementation(address).notice: Sets a new implementation address for deploying UUPS proxies.

unpause().notice: Resumes duel creation and updates by the factory.

documentation.text:
@notice Pauses duel creation and updates by the factory.
 @dev Only the contract owner can call this function.

@notice Resumes duel creation and updates by the factory.
 @dev Only the contract owner can call this function.
